member.name: M:QSS.Components.Windows.Forms.NativeMethods.ExcludeClipRect(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new clipping region that consists of the existing clipping region minus the specified rectangle.
member.param: Handle to the device context.
Specifies the x-coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the y-coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the x-coordinate, in logical units, of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the y-coordinate, in logical units, of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
member.returns:
The return value specifies the new clipping region's complexity; it can be one of the following values.
Value Meaning
NULLREGION Region is empty.
SIMPLEREGION Region is a single rectangle.
COMPLEXREGION Region is more than one rectangle.
ERROR No region was created.
member.remarks: The lower and right edges of the specified rectangle are not excluded from the clipping region.
